description: Below is the official procurement notice:\
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Project Title: Scraping and Painting DFO Lighthouse

### Project Details

* **Title:** Scraping and Painting DFO Lighthouse – Cote-Nord/Port-Cartier, Ile-aux Oeufs (QC)
* **Reference Number:** cb-7454-71203498
* **Solicitation Number:** 30004427
* **Amendment Number:** 4
* **Tender Closing Date:** August 11, 2023, 14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** August 7, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** November 1, 2023

### Scope of Work

* The project involves scraping off the existing paint and sealing in any remaining contamination on the exterior of the DFO lighthouse.
* Repairing damaged concrete surfaces.
* Optional: conducting a site assessment to identify additional work required, including replacing glass in the lighthouse dome.
* Optional: removing debris from inside the lighthouse.

### Security Requirements

* No security clearance is required for this project.
* The supplier and their staff must not have access to protected or classified information/assets.
* The supplier and their staff must not have unescorted access to restricted areas of the Fisheries and Oceans Canada facility or Canadian Coast Guard vessels.
* The supplier and their staff must not remove protected or classified information/assets from the DFO site.
* Subcontracts or arrangements with third-party contractors require prior written approval from the Contracting Authority.

### Trade Agreements

* This project is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Contact Information

* Contracting Authority: Gloria Tsaka Kipuni
	+ Phone: 343-598-4182
	+ Email: DFO.tenders-soumissions.MPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca

### Inquiries

* Inquiries regarding this project should be directed to the Contracting Authority.
* Please note that the Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language.  Word count [400]  written to the client.  You can add the logo of the contracting agency in the same document to increase the confidence of the client.

Best regards,
[Your Name]  Expert Technical Writer.  Please feel free to contact me, if you need any further assistance.   [Contact Information]   Looking forward hearing back from you soon. [Your Name] Expert Technical Writer.   re
